timeline.bodyText: why are you changing also the Broadcastbrick
timeline.author: PlantinumX

replies.bodyText: it was necessary to change the basefunction to enable the identification of multiplible dropdown's
replies.author: Koell

timeline.author: PlantinumX

replies.bodyText: the same reason as above applies to every similar codechange in different files that added the id as a parameter
replies.author: Koell

timeline.author: PlantinumX

replies.bodyText: to enable multiple assertBricks inside one project without the current workaround
replies.author: Koell

timeline.message:
CATROID-507 added AssertUserListBrick

added abstract UserDataBrick which enables multiple UserLists and UserVariables similar to FormulaBrick, which simplifies portability
added UserDataBrick to XStream
added functionality of AssertUserListAction which compares two UserLists
adjusted AssertEqualError message
added abstract AssertAction
added new test style so that it can be easily adjusted
